channel.title: Need help! How to make only 20 players alloud on the server at a time
channel.description:
Need help! How to make only 20 players alloud on the server at a time, so when theres 20 players, no one more can join until the spaces free up.
Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2007, 04:44:47 PM[/size][hr]This is probably the most easy thing to do and no one helps :(

item.title: Need help! How to make only 20 players alloud on the server at a time
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

yea i know, but i dont know in which file to look, client.java? player.java? server.java? help me plz !
